summaries: This document is a Form 10-K annual report by Oracle Corporation for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2025. The report is filed with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The company's common stock is registered under Section 12(b) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol ORCL. The report also includes information about Oracle Corporation's senior notes due July 2025. The company is classified as a large accelerated filer, and it has filed all required reports during the preceding 12 months. The report states that non-affiliates held an aggregate market value of $305,793,119,000 of voting stock based on May 31, 2025, and there were 2,808,833,000 shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025. The report includes a reference to portions of Oracle Corporation's definitive proxy statement for the 2025 annual meeting of stockholders, which will be filed with the SEC within 120 days of the fiscal year end.
